murals.title: Aransas Pass Police Department
murals.description: Interior mural inside the Aransas Pass Police Department - head inside to check it out!

murals.title: Aransas Pass City Hall
murals.description: A vibrant mural depicting the rich history and culture of Aransas Pass, Texas, located on the side of the City Hall building.

murals.title: Ellis Memorial Library
murals.description: Farley boats, Planters, and an Interior Mural in the Special Collections Room.

murals.title: H.G. Olsen Elementary School
murals.description: A Creative Redesign of the School's Logo on an Exterior Wall.

murals.title: Michies Self Storage
murals.description: An underwater-themed Farley boat featuring playful sea creatures storing their treasures in miniature storage units - bringing whimsy to a Port Aransas community art piece.

murals.title: First Mural - Dyna Street
murals.description: My very first mural - a career-defining moment that launched my journey from server to full-time artist.

murals.title: FBISD
murals.description: An interactive photo-op mural where students can stand in front of painted hornet wings - bringing school spirit to life at the 3rd & 4th grade building.

murals.title: The Corner of Whitecap & Aquarius
murals.description: A corner mural showcasing my love for sea turtles.

murals.title: Aransas Pass Aquatic Center
murals.description: Interior pool area mural - one of the murals featured in my AR experience project.

murals.title: Portillo Residence - Free Little Library
murals.description: A residential garage door mural featuring tropical flowers and cuddly friends - visit the painted cottage-style Free Little Library to take a book, leave a book, and enjoy the art!
